mapper.select: SELECT store_id, store_name, address, store_img, category, approve, price, product_cnt, open_at, closed_at FROM tbl_store WHERE store_id = #{store_id}

SELECT c.customer_id, c.profile_image, c.nickname, c.customer_phone_number, p.product_id, r.reservation_id, r.reservation_time, r.cancel_reservation_at, r.picked_up_at, p.pickup_time, p.product_upload_date, s.price, s.open_at, s.closed_at FROM tbl_reservation r JOIN tbl_customer c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN tbl_product p ON p.product_id = r.product_id JOIN tbl_store s ON s.store_id = p.store_id WHERE s.store_id = #{store_id} ORDER BY p.pickup_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_product (store_id, pickup_time, product_upload_date) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{closedAt}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT p.pickup_time, s.open_at, s.closed_at, s.product_cnt, p.canceled_by_store_at FROM tbl_store s LEFT JOIN tbl_product p ON p.store_id = s.store_id AND DATE(p.pickup_time) = #{date} WHERE s.store_id = #{storeId} LIMIT 1
SELECT DISTINCT store_id, store_name, product_cnt, open_at, closed_at FROM tbl_store
SELECT store_id, holidays FROM tbl_store_holidays WHERE store_id = #{storeId}

SELECT p.pickup_time, p.product_upload_date, p.canceled_by_store_at, r.reservation_time, r.cancel_reservation_at, r.picked_up_at FROM tbl_product p LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_reservation r ON p.product_id = r.product_id WHERE p.store_id = #{storeId} AND DATE(product_upload_date) = #{date}
